title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the antiderivative

1 point is earned for the answer

∫ 0 1.5 ( 3 f ′ ( x )+4 ) dx=3 ∫ 0 1.5 f ′ ( x )dx+ ∫ 0 1.5 4dx       =3f( x )+4x | 0 1.5 =3( −1−( −7 ) )+4( 1.5 )=24 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@79D1@

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the tangent line

1 point is earned for computing y on tangent line at x = 1.2

1 point is earned for the answer with reason

y=5( x−1 )−4 f( 1.2 )≈5( 0.2 )−4=−3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4DB0@

The approximation is less than f(1.2) because the graph of f is concave up on the interval

1 < x < 1.2.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the reference to MVT for f' (or differentiability of f')

1 point is earned for the value of r for interval 0≤x≤0.5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D40@

By the Mean Value Theorem there is a c with 0 < c < 0.5 such that

f ″ ( c )= f ′ ( 0.5 )− f ′ ( 0 ) 0.5−0 = 3−0 0.5 =6=r MathType@MTEF@5@5@@507F@

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answers "no" with reference to g' or g"

1 point is earned for the correct reason

lim x→ 0 − g ′ (x)= lim x→ 0 − (4x−1)=−1 lim x→ 0 + g ′ (x)= lim x→ 0 + (4x+1)=+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6CBF@

Thus g' is not continuous at x = 0, but f' is continuous at x = 0, so f≠g MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiabgcMi5kaadEgaaaa@3992@ .

OR

g"(x) = 4 for all x≠0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiabgcMi5kaaicdaaaa@3972@ , but it was shown in part (c) that f"(c) = 6 for some c≠0, so f≠g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40D9@ .

Thus g' is not continuous at x = 0, but f' is continuous at x = 0, so f≠g MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiabgcMi5kaadEgaaaa@3992@ .
